text.front:
HYDROBIOL. BULL. 25(2), 121-124 (1991)
PHYTOPLANKTON COMMUNITY COMPOSITION IN LAKE XOLOTLAN
(MANAGUA)
E. HOOKER, M. RUIZ and M. PUM
KEYWORDS: community composition; phytoplankton; tropical lake
ABSTRACT
Results of two years of research on phytoplankton species composition in Lake Xolotl,~n (Managua) are
presented. A summary of the planktonic algae from other Nicaraguan lakes is also included. One hundred and
twenty phytoplankton taxa were identified. A list of species and comments about relevant properties of the
most frequent taxa are given. The qualitative composition of Lake Xolotl~n phytoplankton is compared with
that of other tropical waterbodies.
121
Address of the authors:
CENTRO PARA LA INVESTIGACION EN RECURSOS ACUATICOS DE NICARAGUA,
Apartado Postal 4598, Managua, Nicaragua.
